Chances are, you know this game already, and honestly, its good. It's always fun to join a competitive game and just stay there and play with skilled players. Now I will not say that this game is easy to play. It is HARD, I myself am not that good at it compared to all of the veterans who have played this, but it's just so nice to enjoy a casual game with some friends you just met online and play some games together.
